function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Significant increase in confirmed cases and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement travel bans and national emergency responses","Technologies":"Travel restriction technologies, emergency response technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate individual control measures during Chinese Spring Festival holiday","Impact":"Delay in epidemic growth and high case numbers","Mitigation":"Implement nonpharmaceutical transmission control measures","Technologies":"Nonpharmaceutical transmission control technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health agencies"}]}
